title: Remembering the past and looking forward to the future

abstract: 'We were on the sea for seven days and seven nights.'
description: A story of escape  by boat from Vietnam to a Malaysian refugee camp, and then to Australia in 1986 where Cuong Manh Pham eventually made a new life, reuniting with his family in 1990.
